basics.name: John Teske
basics.label: HTML Email and Front End Developer / Composer
basics.summary: HTML Email and Front End Developer

work.summary:
Add functionality to main website using HTML, CSS, PHP, JavaScript, jQuery, and ExpressionEngine tags.
                Maintain exhibition microsites built on ExpressionEngine, Wordpress, and Tumblr.
                Manage major web development projects with contract developers.
                Design and code HTML email marketing campaigns.
                Refine email development workflow and consistency of code through custom Grunt task runner.
                Create digital signage content to display exhibition, program, and membership information to museum visitors.
                Edit and publish content to website and microsites, media sites such as YouTube, SoundCloud, and Vimeo, and social media platforms including Facebook, Twitter, and Instagram.
                Apply SEO best practices and monitor website and email analytics.

Compose and produce music with an emphasis on listener experience and environment.
                Design web and print media, including flyers, handbills, social media content, and website.
                Document and edit audio, photos, and video.
                Develop custom software tools and interfaces for music production and research.

work.position: Lead Audio Visual Technician and Facilities Associate
work.summary:
Coproduced high quality cultural experiences with presenters and museum staff.
                Managed contract event technicians and advised exhibitions department on audio design for gallery shows.
                Optimized and enhanced presentation and audience experience through content formatting and customer service.
                Performed regular gallery maintenance as Facilities Associate.

Developed personalized solutions for customers, from budget repair and maintenance to building new bikes with custom part kits.
                Designed and built storage and display solutions after remodel, advised on website and visual design overhaul.

Facilitated the production of concerts, lectures, and film screenings.
                Operated audio/visual equipment, designed and hung custom lighting for exhibition opening events.
In addition to regular service tasks, assisted in the development of a more user-centered customer service structure.

Developed and coordinated education and outreach programs, managed administrative and concert operations, designed digital and print materials, maintained and optimized website, provided in-office IT support.

work.company: University of Washington School of Art
